item.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate major update, DLC character Metalhead announced
item.content:encoded:
Super Evil Megacorp has announced a major free update for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate, as well as the paid downloadable content character “Metalhead.” Both will launch on September 30.

Here are the details:

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate is powering up with its biggest update since launch! With both free and paid content, there is something for everyone. We are taking the game to the next level on September 30, 2025.

  • New Arcade Mode (free) – Hex and flex your way. Arcade Mode is intense, fast-paced, and offers unique challenge runs.
  • New Playable Character: Metalhead (paid downloadable content) – He is our first full-range hero, armed with a powerful laser gun, explosive landmines, and tactical skills.
  • Metalhead Companion Content (free) – Metalhead’s debut ties directly into the free Arcade Mode, bringing additional narrative and content for all players.
  • Game Improvements (free) – We’ve also added over 100 improvements across the game.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate is available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor coming to iOS, Android in November
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone

Currently available for Xbox Series and PC.

Following its launch for Xbox Series and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on September 17, Ghost Ship Publishing and developer Funday Games will release single-player survivor-like auto-shooter Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play in November, the companies announced. The mobile version is co-developed by Piktiv.

“We’ve realized that Survivor was perfect for smaller, portable devices when we saw how popular the game has become on Steam Deck,” said Funday Games producer Jacob Laurits Besenbacher Kjeldsen in a press release. “It felt only natural to bring the game’s bullet heaven action to mobile, and soon players will be able to rock and stone on the phone wherever they are!”

Here is an overview of the mobile version, via Ghost Ship Publishing:

  • Mining Bullet Heaven Action – The survivor-like gameplay allows brave dwarves to dig deep into planet Hoxxes IV and use an increasingly powerful arsenal of weaponry to push back the Glyphid bugs that reside within a range of biomes, ranging from the wondrous Azure Weald to the deadly lava-filled Magma Core.
  • Upgrades People, Upgrades – Lay waste to the local fauna and gain experience to level up and become a one-man army. Complete mission objectives to become even stronger, and venture safely to the drop pod as you dive deeper into the planet’s surface.
  • Time to Gear Up – With the newly introduced Gear system, players can choose a wide selection of peripherals, including Armor, Weapon Mods, Canisters to change weapon stats, Gadgets to help with collection or mining, or Chips to upgrade the trusty sidekick, Bosco.
  • A Seamless Experience – Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor will bring the same hardcore, intense feel of the PC game to mobile devices while making sure it feels natural to play.

item.title: Painkiller delayed to October 21, roguelike game mode revealed
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Fight through procedurally generated areas.

Publisher 3D Realms and developer Anshar Studios have delayed Painkiller, the reimagining of the classic first-person shooter franchise, from its previously planned October 9 release date to October 21. It will be available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.

The companies also revealed “Rogue Angel,” a roguelike game mode separate from the main campaign. Rogue Angel takes players to a new realm of Purgatory, where players will advance through procedurally generated arenas; collect tarot cards, weapons, and items along the way; and take on bosses.

Here is an overview of the game, via 3D Realms:

About

Welcome to Purgatory! You’ve been sentenced for your transgressions against Heaven, but the Voice of the Creator is giving you one chance to redeem yourself. Blast through hordes of demons in brutal, fast-paced combat with an array of infernal weapons. Battle across gruesome gothic environments to stop the fallen angel Azazel’s invasion of Earth and earn your salvation—solo or in online cooperative play for up to three players.

Key Features

  • Purgatory Is Your Playground – Jump, hook and dash across vast, spine-chilling biomes while fighting nightmarish enemies in bloody, fast-paced combat with a host of new and classic Painkiller weapons.
  • Three-Player Online Cooperative Play – Play online with up to two friends, exploring diverse locations, uncovering secrets, and facing off against terrifying enemies.
  • Grotesque Terrors Await – Challenge a variety of horrifying foes, from hordes of demons to titanic terrors like the monstrous children of Azazel—the Nephilim.
  • Unleash the Pain – Use tarot cards to upgrade your abilities, rank up to expand your arsenal, and team up with other players to obliterate all foes.
  • Choose Your Character Wisely – Play as one of four distinctive characters—Ink, Void, Sol, and Roch—with unique perks to boost your energy, health, power, and damage.
